Class SimulatorCanvas

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Canvas
org.robolectric.simulator.SimulatorCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class SimulatorCanvas extends java.awt.Canvas
A Canvas that draws screenshots taken with RNG.
